welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Melsele, Belgium! Known for its quaint charm and picturesque landscapes, we invite you to explore our beautiful city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in our local culture."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Zoersel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal of Zoersel Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly intercontinental flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
